Title: Oriume
Writer: Akane Shiratori (screenplay), Hisako Matsui, Akane Hakucho
Actors: Mieko Harada, Kazuko Yoshiyuki, Masa Tommies, Asami Tano
Plot: About a family shouldering an unexpected responsibility when Alzheimer's disease strikes their grandmother. The superb cast portrays this serious and realistic situation with heart-warming ...
